title: LPD IDs suspect in shooting of 2 girls
content:
The man accused of killing two girls Monday in West Central Laredo has been identified.
LPD identified the suspect as Juan Antonio Torres, 67. Police said he was the girls' neighbor and had gone to their home Monday in the 1800 block of Convent Avenue to ask their family for money.
LPD said Torres brandished a handgun while talking to the girls' mother. The mother fled the home to call 911 while her children, Anel Martinez, 16, and Allysson Martinez, 6, tried to escape through the backyard.
Read the full story in Wednesday's newspaper and e-edition.
